alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 11:28AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, north central Hardeman, southern Madison and northern Chester Counties through NOON CST... At 1128 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mercer, or 7 miles northwest of Chickasaw State Forest, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Henderson, Chickasaw State Park, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Cloverport, Mercer, Medon, Neely, Pinson, Malesus, Parkburg, Beech Bluff, Huron, Russell Crossroads, Madison Hall, Uptonville, Deanburg, Teague and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for western Tennessee.
